Name: Escape Covid Camp
About the game: Contained within a world of steel, this is not the life you chose. Explore your new home that saps the souls of all who it contains. Fabricate a plan to escape this world force upon you. Freedom is your mission. Craft food in the cafeteria to trade with others. Trade with other inhabitants of the camp to receive items useful in escaping. Set traps for the unsuspecting guards to fall victim to. Make a run for the forest. Just don't get caught! Scavenge camp for useful resources.
Meta Title: Escape Covid Camp: Nov 30, 2021, RedZyrro and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Escape Covid Camp? Check out the release date (Nov 30, 2021), developer insights from RedZyrro, and a complete game summary.
